headline: 13,500 estudiantes realizan examen de admisión 2026 de la UES
main_themes: Ingreso universitario 2026
capacidad de cupos (≈10,000 disponibles según autoridades)
inclusión de estudiantes con discapacidad en el proceso
notes: Article reports number of examinees (~13,500) and cites available slots (~10,000) and mentions students with disabilities participating.

headline: Conductor lesionado en accidente de tránsito en Ciudad Delgado, San Salvador Centro
main_themes: Tránsito y accidentes viales
Servicios de emergencia y reporte policial
Impacto local en Ciudad Delgado / Troncal del Norte
notes: Short local news item — one injured, location specified on Panamericana/Troncal del Norte; corroborated by PNC / local posts.

headline: ¿Qué hará el periodista salvadoreño Mario Guevara tras su deportación?
key_entities: organizaciones de libertad de prensa (mencionadas in context)
main_themes: Deportación de un periodista (tras >100 días en custodia de ICE)
Impacto en la libertad de prensa y reacciones de organizaciones defensores
Planes personales de Guevara (ej. escribir un libro sobre historias de inmigrantes según la entrevista)
sentiment_editorial_stance: Sympathetic / concerned (human-interest framing and focus on consequences for journalist and family)
notes: La Prensa Gráfica interviewed Guevara about plans after deportation (writing a book, etc.). Broad international coverage corroborates deportation and rights-groups' concern.

headline: El analfabetismo en El Salvador aumentó en 2024
key_entities: Banco Central de Reserva (datos de Encuesta de Hogares)
main_themes: Aumento de la tasa de analfabetismo (2023 → 2024; ~0.25–0.3 pp increase)
Persistencia de brechas educativas
Implicaciones para políticas públicas y educación básica
sentiment_editorial_stance: Concerned / cautionary (points to a reversal or slowing of prior improvements)
notes: Article cites the Encuesta de Hogares / BCR data (reported 9.6% in 2024 vs ~9.3% in 2023). Other Salvadoran outlets report similar numbers.

headline: Docentes: del 'lenguaje inclusivo' — hay otros temas prioritarios
key_entities: Karla Trigueros (ministra, mentioned in wider context)
gobierno de Nayib Bukele (context of national policy)
main_themes: Debate sobre prohibición/uso del lenguaje inclusivo en escuelas
Docentes demandan priorizar problemas como presupuesto y cumplimiento de la ley
Context of recent ministry directives restricting inclusive language
sentiment_editorial_stance: Mixed / critical (reports teachers' view that policy focus is misplaced; contextual coverage shows government push to ban inclusive language)
notes: Article relays teachers' reactions that other issues (budget, infrastructure, law compliance) are more pressing than debates on inclusive language; broader reporting ties this to recent Ministry/Presidential measures.

headline: Partidos políticos estarán incluidos en nueva ley contra lavado de dinero
main_themes: Reforma de la ley antilavado para ampliar sujetos obligados (incluyendo partidos políticos)
Debate sobre alcance y efectos de la norma
Links to thresholds, reporting obligations and anti-money-laundering compliance
sentiment_editorial_stance: Neutral / explanatory (reports legislative change and positions of actors)
notes: Article summarizes Commission activity and that political parties would be explicitly included among entities regulated by the new anti-money-laundering law; related pieces discuss changes to declaration thresholds and regulatory scope.

headline: Diputado de Nuevas Ideas pide investigar aplicación de Ley de Agentes Extranjeros a remesas
main_themes: Preocupaciones y reportes sobre descuentos aplicados a remesas bajo el argumento de 'agente extranjero'
Pedidos a autoridades (SSF) para investigar denuncias
Political debate over whether remittances could be affected by the 30% foreign agents tax / compliance rules
sentiment_editorial_stance: Concern / investigatory (focus on verifying alleged impacts on remittances; some political alarm)
notes: Article notes a legislator raised reports of remittance recipients being charged/discunted purportedly under 'agents extranjeros' rules and requested SSF review; government/other sources have issued denials in parallel coverage.

headline: MOVIR muestra preocupación por juicios masivos que podrían durar meses en El Salvador
primary_topic: Human rights / Legal system / Civil society
main_themes: Criticism/concern about mass trials of persons detained under the state of exception
Potential lengthy judicial processing (months) and impact on defendants' rights
Civil-society monitoring of justice process outcomes
sentiment_editorial_stance: Critical / concerned (civil-society alarm about fairness and duration of mass judicial processes)
notes: MOVIR representative warns juicios masivos could last months; article highlights possible procedural and human-rights implications.

headline: Denuncian presiones para forzar retiros voluntarios en alcaldía de San Salvador Este
key_entities: empleados de la Alcaldía de San Salvador Este
main_themes: Denuncias de intimidación o presión para aceptar retiros 'voluntarios' con liquidación tope
Labor rights, municipal restructuring and potential politicization of personnel changes
Union / worker complaints and calls for clarification
sentiment_editorial_stance: Critical / exposé (reports worker allegations of intimidation and limited severance offers)
notes: Workers claim they were summoned to accept a 'voluntary' retirement with an alleged cap (≈$15,000); municipal labor-rights context and prior similar cases in other municipalities are relevant.
